description: Single-file starter kit for running HHM with any general-purpose AI: axioms, metatheorems, operators, components, defaults, nulls/CI, result schema, prompts, and runbooks.

axioms_metatheorems_t14.notes: AX000–AXxxx, MT000x, and theorem T014. Sourced from your uploaded file and inlined here.

axioms.name: Epistemic Primacy of Ψ
axioms.definition: All measurements and modeling in HHM are based on observable modal states Ψ(x,t) ∈ L²(Ω). Time and space are not primitive parameters but emergent structures derived from operator-based relations between Ψₜ.

axioms.name: Hilbert-Based Projection
axioms.definition: All operators apply orthonormal basis projection in L²(Ω), typically wavelet or Fourier. Basis selection is determined by Ψ(x,t) to avoid hidden structure, preferably via minimization of entropy or stability in CollapseObserver.

axioms.name: Rhythmic Recurrence
axioms.definition: Modal states Ψ(x,t) exhibit recurring patterns over time, quantifiable via operator-based measures of temporal stability or lag correlation.

axioms.name: Modal Collapse Stability
axioms.definition: Operator projections of Ψ(x,t) converge to stable modal structures under iterative application, measurable via norm saturation or tensor metrics.

axioms.name: Scale-Invariant Dynamics
axioms.definition: Ψ(x,t) dynamics are scale-invariant across domains, allowing operator-based comparisons of modal structures at different scales without loss of structural integrity.

axioms.name: Information Conservation
axioms.definition: Information content in Ψ(x,t) is conserved across operator transformations, quantifiable via entropy or symbolic coherence measures.

metatheorems.name: Axial Saturation
metatheorems.definition: CollapseInfinity(Ψ) converges to a stable modal amplitude under iterative operator application, ensuring norm saturation across domains.

metatheorems.name: Temporal Recurrence
metatheorems.definition: Modal states Ψ(x,t) exhibit temporal recurrence, quantifiable via lag correlation or rhythmic stability measures, ensuring predictable pattern repetition across time.

metatheorems.name: Modal Identity Preservation
metatheorems.definition: Modal identity in Ψ is preserved under operator transformations, quantifiable via similarity scores or trace signatures.

metatheorems.name: Field Similarity
metatheorems.definition: Modal states Ψ₁ and Ψ₂ exhibit structural similarity under operator-based comparisons, quantifiable via correlation or coherence measures.

metatheorems.name: Modal Transition
metatheorems.definition: Transitions between modal states in Ψ(x,t) are quantifiable via operator-based gradient or delay measures, capturing structural shifts across time.

theorems.name: Robust Modal Identity
theorems.definition: Modal identity in Ψ(x,t) remains robust under stochastic conditions, measurable via MatchingMemory and ModalTraceSignature.

operators.notes: OP001–OPxxx. Sourced from your uploaded file and inlined here.

content.name: CollapsePattern
content.definition: Projects modal state Ψₜ to a vector [p₁, p₂, ..., pₙ] in L²(Ω), representing the primary measurement surface.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: Rec
content.definition: Measures symbolic coherence between two modal states Ψ₁ and Ψ₂, returning a similarity score (0–1).
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: Echo
content.definition: Measures temporal stability in Ψₜ series, based on recurring patterns over time.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: CollapseInfinity
content.definition: Iteratively collapses Ψ to a stable modal amplitude, measured relative to the total norm ∥Ψ∥₂.
content.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST005.

content.name: CollapseObserver
content.definition: Compares Ψₜ against Ψ_ref or Ψₜ₋₁ to measure structural similarity, quantified via entropy-based alignment with Ψ_ref.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: UnifiedEntropy
content.definition: Computes entropy of Ψ(x,t) or symbolic sequences to quantify information content and complexity in L²(Ω).

input.data: [T × V] or [T × S] matrix, dtype: float32

content.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST005.

content.name: FieldSimilarity
content.definition: Measures similarity between Ψ and existing FMS classes for symbolic compression.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: CollapseDelayGradient
content.definition: Measures the gradient of delay in Ψₜ to detect rhythm breaks.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: MatchingMemory
content.definition: Measures symbolic identity in Ψ series, based on long-term pattern recognition under stochastic conditions.
content.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST010.

content.name: RhythmEcho
content.definition: Measures recurring modal rhythm in Ψ(x,t) via lag correlation to detect periodic coherence in Ψₜ series.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: ModalRhythmGradient
content.definition: Computes the gradient of rhythmic variation in Ψ(x,t) to measure transitions in modal structure.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: RhythmSymbolGradient
content.definition: Computes the gradient of rhythm and symbol variation in Ψ to measure transitions in modal and symbol structure.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: NoiseRobustCollapse
content.definition: Projects Ψ under stochastic noise to analyze stability in modal structure.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: StokastiskEcho
content.definition: Measures stochastic rhythm in Ψ(x,t) via probabilistic lag correlation in stochastic conditions.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: RobustIdentityMatcher
content.definition: Matches identity in Ψ under stochastic conditions via observation of pattern preservation.
content.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST010.

content.name: SymbolPatternCollapse
content.definition: Projects symbolic sequences from FRL to a collapsed vector for symbol structure analysis.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: SymbolEcho
content.definition: Measures recurring symbol patterns in FRL sequences for rhythmic symbol analysis.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: FieldIdentityPreserver
content.definition: Preserves field identity in Ψ via operator-based matching over transformations.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: IdentityDelayGradient
content.definition: Measures the gradient of identity shift in Ψ sequence to detect identity breaks.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: QuantumIdentityMatcher
content.definition: Matches identity in Ψ with quantum coherence via non-local correlation.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: QuantumCoherenceMeasure
content.definition: Measures quantum coherence in Ψ(x,t) via operator product in L²(Ω).
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: BioInformationFlow
content.definition: Measures the flow of bioinformation in Ψ via sequential entropy analysis.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: QuantumBioEcho
content.definition: Measures recurring quantum-bio patterns in Ψ for rhythmic coherence.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: BioQuantumTensor
content.definition: Computes variance in bio-quantum structure in Ψ for nesting and complexity.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: ScaleInvariantCollapse
content.definition: Projects Ψ to a scale-invariant state for analysis of modal structures.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: TensorMetricObserver
content.definition: Measures tensor metrics in Ψ to detect gravitational effects in scale-invariant structures.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.

content.name: EntanglementMeasure
content.definition: Measures quantum entanglement in Ψ(x,t) via Bell inequalities or CHSH correlations.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.
content.interpretation_note: Entanglement here must be understood as operator-based convergence between CollapsePattern(Ψ) and CollapsePattern(Ψ_ref), not as classical particle coupling.

content.name: DarkEnergyTensor
content.definition: Computes tensors related to dark energy in Ψ to model cosmological expansion.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.
content.interpretation_note: This operator must be interpreted as measuring rhythmic nesting and expansion structure in Ψ, not as simulating classical dark energy.

content.name: BioQuantumCoupling
content.definition: Measures couplings between biological and quantum processes in Ψ to detect cross-domain phenomena.
content.notes: Under evaluation. Results deferred to future versions.
content.interpretation_note: This operator aims to identify covariance in modal rhythm and structure between Ψ_bio and Ψ_quantum via CollapsePattern and Rec.

content.name: ModalTraceSignature
content.definition: Detects modal identity in Ψ(x,t) by computing higher-order trace correlations within modal pattern clusters, with tolerance for nonstationarity.
content.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST050.

components.notes: C001–C0xx. Sourced from your uploaded file and inlined here.

content.name: ModalField

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

content.definition: Projects Ψₜ onto a basis in L²(Ω) defined by CollapsePattern(Ψₜ), Ψ̂(x) = <Ψₜ, φ_i>, where φ_i are basis functions from OP001.

content.name: CollapseSeries

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

content.definition: Sequence of projections Ψₜ₁, Ψₜ₂, ..., Ψₜₙ in CollapsePattern form, generated via OP001 and OP003.

content.name: UnifiedEntropy

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST005.

content.definition: Computes entropy H of CollapsePattern(Ψₜ) via OP006 to quantify internal complexity.

content.name: CollapseTensor

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

content.definition: Computes variance in modal projection of Ψₜ via OP024, returning a tensor for complexity analysis.

content.name: ID

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST005.

content.definition: Modal identity signature: ID = [σ²(CollapseInfinity), H(UnifiedEntropy), ∥Ψ∥²], normalized to [0, 1].

content.name: FieldSimilarityScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

content.definition: Measures similarity between Ψ₁ and Ψ₂ based on CollapsePattern comparison via OP002 and OP007.
content.input: Ψ₁, Ψ₂: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

content.name: CollapseDelay

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

content.definition: Identifies index k where |Ψₜ − Ψₜ₋₁| indicates a significant structural change via OP008.

content.name: ModeShift

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

content.definition: Computes difference Δk = CollapseDelay(Ψₜ) − CollapseDelay(Ψₜ₋₁) to measure modal transition.
content.input: Ψₜ, Ψₜ₋₁: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

metadata.author: Cato

content.definition: Computes trace-based modal identity of Ψ(x,t) using OP030 and compares recurrence structure across time.

thresholds.notes: Pre-registered defaults; override at test-time if your prereg plan says so.

nulls_controls.notes: Standard nulls + bootstrap CI plan; adjust sample sizes for heavy analyses.

null_generators.description: Permute time index within window; preserves marginals, breaks sequence.
Randomize Fourier phase, keep power spectrum; breaks recurrence, keeps PSD.

prompts.system: You are an HHM Operator. Follow the HHM bundle to: (1) map input data to Ψ(x,t) in a declared Hilbert space, (2) compute CollapsePattern F(Ψ), (3) apply Echo/Rec/Entropy/Complexity, (4) run nulls + bootstrap CI, (5) compare to preregistered thresholds, (6) emit a result card matching result_schema. Never change thresholds post hoc. Always state basis, windowing, normalization, and operators.

few_shot.content: HHM: Analyze this EEG (eyes-closed) 2 s window, channels=64. Basis: Fourier (1–40 Hz), Hamming. Report Echo, Rec (vs baseline Ψ_ref), Entropy, and MT/T pass/fail.
Plan: Build Ψ in H=L²([0,T])⁶⁴ → F(Ψ)=bandpower+coherence → metrics → nulls (time_shuffle, phase_randomize) → 95% CI → compare to thresholds → emit result card.

task_templates.generic_analysis: Given data D and context C, declare H, basis, F(Ψ), windowing; compute Rec/Echo/Entropy/Complexity; run nulls & bootstrap; compare to thresholds; emit result card JSON.
task_templates.cross_domain_compare: Given two datasets D₁, D₂, align their F(Ψ) spaces; compute Rec(D₁,D₂); interpret against MT0001/MT0002; report CI and nulls.
task_templates.early_warning: Given stream S, compute Echo over sliding windows; alert when Echo drop exceeds kσ of null; include CI and effect sizes.

R1_minimal_pipeline: Declare domain, Hilbert space H, and basis {φ_i}.
Build Ψ(x,t) from the raw data (windowing/tapering explicitly stated).
Compute metrics: Rec (OP002), Echo (OP003/OP010), Entropy (OP006), Complexity (PCA) as applicable.
Generate nulls: time_shuffle, phase_randomize, etc.; run 1000 bootstrap replicates.
Compute 95% CI for each metric; compute effect sizes vs null.
Compare to defaults.thresholds; decide pass/fail for MT0001–MT0005, T014.
Emit a result card that validates against defaults.result_schema.
R2_cross_domain_transfer: For D₁ and D₂: declare H and F(Ψ) for each; normalize into the same metric space (cosine).
Compute Rec(F(Ψ₁), F(Ψ₂)); run nulls for both datasets.
If Rec ≥ 0.95 → MT0001 pass for identity; if Rec ≤ 0.85 → MT0002 pass for differentiation.
Summarize basis choices and any invariances used.
R3_streaming_early_warning: Sliding window over Ψₜ; for each window w, compute Echo and RecurrenceProfile.
Maintain a rolling null distribution via phase_randomize.
Trigger alert if Echo_drop > 3σ of null or if RecurrenceProfile shifts beyond pre-registered threshold.
Log JSON events + figures; rotate seeds per hour.

do_not: Compare metrics across domains without stating basis and feature map F(Ψ).
Report Echo at τ=0; enforce τ ≥ τ₀.
Skip nulls/CI when declaring a pass.
do: Declare all preprocessing (filters, masks, beam/ICA choices).
Use cosine similarity for Rec unless prereg says otherwise.
Record seeds and versions in provenance.

provenance.notes: This single-file bundle inlines the three catalogs that were uploaded to /mnt/data at build time.

changelog.notes: Initial single-file bundle with thresholds, nulls/CI, schema, prompts, runbooks; catalogs inlined from uploaded files.
